Analog Aqua removes toxic gases from water and purifies water and soil. Analogue Aqua also inhibits the growth of harmful plankton. Keeps fish habitat clean. Analog aqua reduces the oxygen level in the water to 4-5 ppm and plays a special role in preventing fish overcrowding. Analog Aqua removes odours from water and increases the beneficial bacteria that convert water and soil nutrients into acceptable food for phytoplankton and zooplankton. Improves the FCRK of food and keeps the ratio of nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium normal in water. Using analogue aqua every month keeps the fish healthy and strong.

The use of Oxy-Aqua increases the amount of dissolved oxygen required. Reduces the amount of chlorine in water bodies. It is a good disinfectant. Oxy-Aqua protects fish and shrimp against protozoa with regular use. Oxy-Aqua can provide up to 14% oxygen in pond water.

PANDORA is a biology product, containing useful bacteria, and Zeolites. Improve Quality of Water: Stabilize the dissolved oxygen content in the pond and disintegrate the excess organic substances at the bottom and source of the pond. It prevents infectious diseases due to harmful bacteria. It also absorbs toxic gas such as NH, HS and heavy metal icons. improve the growth rate of algae and plankton; stabilize the color of water during culture period.

1. Suppression of water and soil bacteria and fungi.
2. Increase in hormone production.
3. Decomposition of pond waste.
4. Plankton production in water.

Geo-fast maintains the quality of water and soil when used in the right amount. Removes harmful gas ammonia, carbon dioxide, and hydrogen sulphite and makes the water suitable for fish farming. Geo-fast removes soil odours and increases oxygen levels in pond bottoms. The destruction of harmful bacteria and microorganisms plays a special role. Geo-Fast increases the number of probiotics and minerals in pond water and helps produce natural food
For Fish 15gm per decimal 4-5 feet water level.
Normal hypoxia: 3-5 g/percent 4-5 ft water depth Acute hypoxia: 5-8 g/percent 4-5 ft water depth.

1. The first 3 month: 5 to 8 kgs per acre of water for once 2-3 weeks.\n2. The second 3 months: 5 to 6 kgs per acre of water for once 10 to 15 days Mix PANDORA With water then spread evenly to the pond.
1. 100 grams per week at 3-4 feet depth in 33-century ponds.\n2. In food: 1-3 g/kg food.
8-10 kg per acre in a water depth of 4-5 feet.
1. Store in a cool and dry place\n2. Protect from sunlight\n3. Keep out of the reach of children’s Storage

1. Create water movement with bamboo
2. Switch on the aerator if you have any
3. Change 30-50% water
4. Add water to maintain a water depth of 4.5-7 feet.
Please chose your collected water DO level.

1. Fish stopped feeding
2. Fish are stressed
3. Fish are suffocating
4. Fish are gathering at the embankment
5. These problems are mostly observed in the early morning
The water DO level is at an optimum level, so there is nothing to be worried about
